content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 10.5, 10.5), boiler(position -6.0, 24.5) and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of 
- Burner mining drill (position -15.0, -50.0) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate production at position(40.0, -82.0)
Consists of 
- Furnace (position 40.0, -82.0), 
- Furnace (position 45.0, -83.0), 
- Furnace (position 42.0, -81.0), 
- Furnace (position 45.0, -80.0), 
- Furnace (position 40.0, -79.0) 
and respective chests

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with no power

### Inserter system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position 3.5, 0.5), 
- Chest (position 2.5, 0.5), 
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 1.5)

### Inserter system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of 
- Burner inserter (position 0.5, 3.5), 
- Chest (position 0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment but being out of fuel
- Make sure to refuel burner equipment before using them
### Errors when using furnace but having no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when using generator but having no input liquid
- Ensure that the generator has the required input liquid before starting the generation process
### Errors when using lab but having no power
- Ensure that the lab has power before using it
### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
- Ensure that the inserter has source items before using it
